meta.title: Fitness Story - Transform Apple Health & Watch Workouts into Visual Journeys
meta.description: Transform your Apple Watch and Health workouts into beautiful visual journeys. Track running, cycling, swimming & more. Analyze trends, personal records, and progress.

hero.title: Your Fitness Journey, Beautifully Visualized
hero.description: Transform your Apple Watch and Health data into a beautiful, insightful journey. Track running, cycling, swimming, and all your workouts. Analyze trends, personal records, and celebrate every victory.

features.title: Powerful Features
features.subtitle: Everything you need to understand and celebrate your fitness journey

storyline.title: Storyline
storyline.description: Experience your fitness history as a continuous narrative. Scroll through a rich, visual timeline that weaves your activities together with your memories.

dashboard.title: Interactive Dashboard
dashboard.description: Access a fully interactive dashboard that connects your daily movement to your overall well-being. Track consistency with contribution graphs and streak counters.

analytics.title: Professional Analytics
analytics.description: Unlock an analysis suite that fits in your pocket. Compare workouts side-by-side, view year-over-year trends, and track cadence and stride length.

records.title: Personal Records
records.description: We automatically detect Personal Records and display them with your photos and notes. Keep your favorite victories front and center in your Trophy Case.

locations.title: My Locations
locations.description: View your workout history on a map, grouped by city and country. See everywhere your fitness journey has taken you around the world.

favorites.title: Favorites & Tags
favorites.description: Organize your training with custom tags like "Intervals," "Recovery," or "Race Day." Mark your best sessions with a heart to build a collection of top performances.

comparison.title: Workouts Comparison
comparison.description: Compare multiple workouts side-by-side (up to 10) to see your progress. Analyze pace, heart rate, elevation, and more to understand how your performance has evolved over time.

healthMetrics.title: Health Metrics
healthMetrics.description: Monitor all your essential health metrics—from steps and calories to heart rate, VO2 max, sleep, and beyond—at a glance. Compare your trends against personal benchmarks to stay on track.

celebration.title: Celebrate Records
celebration.description: Every personal record deserves recognition. When you break a new PR, celebrate the moment with beautiful visuals that capture your achievement.

colorRoute.title: Color Route
colorRoute.description: Visualize your workout routes like never before. Color your path by pace, elevation, cadence, or stride length to instantly see where you pushed hardest.

widgets.title: Widgets
widgets.description: Keep your fitness data front and center with beautiful home screen widgets. Track steps, calories, workout progress, and body metrics at a glance—no app launch required.

testimonials.title: What Users Say
testimonials.subtitle: Join thousands of fitness enthusiasts who love Fitness Story

review1.quote: "This provides wonderful fitness trends that Apple can't provide otherwise. Gorgeous layout has an Apple feel."

review2.quote: "Finally, a fitness app that turns raw data into visuals that actually motivate me. Love the PR tracking and year-over-year comparison!"

review3.quote: "This is giving me insights that neither Strava nor the health app has been able to provide. If you are into fitness you must give it a try!"

download.title: Start Your Fitness Story Today
download.description: Free to download with optional Pro upgrade for advanced features. Your data stays private on your device.
download.platforms: Available on iPhone, iPad, Mac, and Apple Vision

privacy.title: Your Privacy Matters
privacy.description: Fitness Story reads your data directly from Apple Health in read-only mode. All calculations and analysis happen securely on your device. Your health data is never sent to us or any third parties.
